targets.expr: sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", id!="", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", cluster="", namespace!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", id!="", cluster="", namespace!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]))
sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="", container!="", namespace=~"$namespace", node=~".*master.*"}) by (namespace)
sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="", container!="", namespace=~"$namespace", node=~".*master.*"}) by (node)

ceil(sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", id!="", device=~"(/dev.+)|mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+", cluster="", namespace!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", id!="", cluster="", namespace!="", namespace=~"$namespace"}[5m])))
